Job Title/ Category: Contract Systems Analyst (Bid Ref 53835-2) - J2EE, React.js, EGIS
Location Base: Yau Ma Tei or Wan Chai
Project Nature: "(T26) Web-based application system for Transport Department"
Duties: "- Serve a contract assignment under InfoTech's headcount, full-time second to serve the TD; ;- To support the implementation/on-going maintenance/system enhancement of e-Services and related internal system and monitor the performance of external contractor. ;"
Requirements: "- To assist in the project management including preparation of Project Management Plan for project implementation; ;- Possess experience and skills in design and support of IT web application systems using Enterprise Java application and modern web framework, i.e React.js etc. ;- To prepare and issue assignment brief for project implementation/enhancement and evaluation of proposal from vendors as well as perform quality review on the deliverables submitted by contractors; ;- To monitor the performance of external contractor for providing on-going support services and system enhancement service and perform quality review on the deliverables submitted by contractors; ;- To liaise with parties concerned, including users, contractors, computer operators, etc. for requirement, implementation and on-going activities support; ;- To support users to conduct UAT and other testing like Load/Stress Test, penetration test, etc. ;- To advise users on all-IT related aspects of the supported systems. ; ;Technical Skills: ;. At least 2 years' experience in J2EE Development (JDE); ;. At least 1 year's experience in Production Database Support (PDS); ;. At least 1 year's experience in IT Security (ITS); ;. At least 1 year's experience in EGIS (EGI); ;. 2 years' experience in Electronic Service Delivery (ESD) is an advantage; ;. 2 years' experience in Server Virtualisation Technology (SVT) is an advantage. ; ;Non-technical Skills: ;. At least 2 years' experience in IT service/outsourcing management (OUT); ;. At least 1 year's experience in managing Government projects (MGP); ;. 1 year's experience in Government procurement/disposal procedures (GPD) is an advantage. ; ;- Bachelor's degree/Higher Diploma in Computer Science, IT or equivalent; ;- At least 4 years' post-qualification experience in which at least 1 year's relevant experience in a similar post and in a comparable capacity."
